snippet: The company will take back 20,000 Sevylor River Racer tubes, which people use to float in the water, after consumers reported skin irritation, the Consumer Product Safety Commission said.
abstract: Coleman Company agrees to take more than 20,000 of its inflatable rubber tubes off shelves at Walmart after consumers reported skin irritation after using tubes.
lead_paragraph: The company will take back 20,000 Sevylor River Racer tubes, which people use to float in the water, after consumers reported skin irritation, the Consumer Product Safety Commission said.

headline.main: Coleman Recalls Inflatable Swimming Tubes From Walmart
headline.print_headline: Swim Tubes in Walmart Are Recalled by Coleman
